name: Shudder Speed
description:
This game was created by Master Students from the University of Utah in the Entertainment Arts and Engineering program in a class called "Rapid Prototype". We were given a prompt to create a serious game using specific art style we were given, Art OP.

Premise

Maybe everyone has a dream of learning photography. That is to say, some people don't understand cameras yet, but they always want to take a good-looking landscape picture. To help you understand a few special features of the camera we decided to make a game where we can show you how it controls the environment in the game world. Learn how to take beautiful pictures with your camera and become a camera master.

How to play

Connect your VR headset to your computer before booting up the game. This works best with an Oculus.

Main Triggers are to use your tools. Left Main Trigger is that get a camera.

Right stick is to turn, left stick is to move。

Secondary Triggers is to Grab。
